meanings.definition: The way that someone or something looks
meanings.sent1: Her appearance was neat and tidy, with a smile on her face.
meanings.sent2: The appearance of the new puppy brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent3: Despite his messy appearance, he always had a kind heart.
meanings.sent4: The appearance of the full moon lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The appearance of the rainbow after the rain was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The act of coming into view or becoming visible
meanings.sent1: The sudden appearance of the sun from behind the clouds warmed the earth.
meanings.sent2: His appearance at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The appearance of the magician on stage amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The appearance of the first stars marked the beginning of the night.
meanings.sent5: The appearance of the rare bird delighted the birdwatchers.

meanings.sent1: The appearance of the old house was spooky in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: His appearance of confidence masked his inner nervousness.
meanings.sent3: The appearance of the cake was deceiving; it tasted terrible.
meanings.sent4: The appearance of the storm clouds signaled bad weather ahead.
meanings.sent5: The appearance of the actor on stage captivated the audience.
